meanings.sent1: Playing outside activizes our bodies and minds.
meanings.sent2: Exercising regularly activizes our muscles and improves our health.
meanings.sent3: The energetic music activizes my feet to start dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her encouraging words activize my motivation to achieve my goals.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise activizes the sleepy town, bringing it to life.

meanings.definition: To become active or more active.
meanings.sent1: After a good night's sleep, I slowly activize and start my day.
meanings.sent2: The plants activize with the arrival of spring, blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The alarm clock activizes me abruptly from my dreams.
meanings.sent4: His smile activizes the room, filling it with positivity.
meanings.sent5: The storm activizes the usually calm sea, creating powerful waves.
